participant_1.name: Sophie
participant_1.personality: Sophie is adventurous and introspective, often seeking solace in nature. She is sensitive but determined, especially after her recent breakup.
participant_1.background: i've a pet fish. my favorite color is orange. i like to go hiking in the mornings to see the sunset. i turned 18 years old yesterday. i just broke up with boyfriend two months ago.

participant_2.name: Liam
participant_2.personality: Liam is energetic and focused, with a competitive spirit. He is disciplined and passionate about sports, always pushing himself to achieve more.
participant_2.background: gymnastics is my favorite sport. my favorite color is yellow. i workout four hours a day. i am a gold medalist olympian. i love italian food and garlic bread.
